textList.name: CO_SLAYERS_EMPTY_TEXTS
textList.text: Your jump leads you to nothing but empty space. This Jump Beacon serves no purpose other than as a connection.
You jump into an unremarkable system. No life signs detected within scanning range.
Your jump leads to a completely unremarkable binary star system. There is nothing else around.
Your jump leads to a remarkable binary star system. The view is beautiful, but there is nothing else around.

event.name: CO_MEET_SLAYERS_SCOUT_FIRST_REAL
event.text: Expecting nothing unusual, you begin to charge your engines for the next jump, when suddenly a small, weirdly shaped ship emerges from cloaking. If it weren't moving, you might think it was a tiny station.

To your surprise, you receive an almost instantaneous reply, and it doesn't sound like an autoresponder. "You are definitely not what we were instructed to find. However, the scan shows that you are directly related to the object of our operation. We are requesting your permission for a more detailed inspection and identification of details. This might take some time."

choice.text: Ask who you are talking to.

event.text: "Sooner or later, you would have found out without us, or at least begun to wonder. We are members of the intelligence corps of a corporation that deals with conflicts of particular importance, most of which are caused by Renegades. According to our information, you are one of them. We call ourselves the Slayers. Numerous flawlessly executed operations have proven once again that our designation is appropriate for our field of activity. This is not a taunt or a threat. More of a warning."

choice.text: Ask what operation is being discussed.
Attack the ship without more questions.

event.text: "Did you find out everything you wanted? We guess someone else will tell you the rest." With that said, the line goes dead, and your opponent, who doesn’t seem to pose a serious threat, start charging their weapons.
